document.full_text: police in nigeria have arrested a doctor and 32 pregnant teenage girls who authorities believe belonged to a human-trafficking ring in which babies were sold for adoption or for rituals.
document.title: nigeria police break suspected baby-trafficking ring
lines_and_colors: police in nigeria have arrested a doctor and 32 pregnant teenage girls who authorities believe belonged to a human-trafficking ring in which babies were sold for adoption or for rituals.
